Card List: [D6, D13, H2, H3, H6, H7, S1, S4, S5, S8]

Based on the provided card list and my knowledge of card relevance, I will create a new list that reflects my confidence in the cards. 

The most relevant card based on the rank bump is D6, which is a red card but does not fall into the higher tier ranks. The other red cards (H2, H3, H6, H7) provide a baseline consideration but are less favorable. The black cards (S1, S4, S5, S8) have even lower scores.

Considering the scoring, I will prioritize the cards as follows:

1. D6 (baseline red card)
2. H2 (baseline red card)
3. H3 (baseline red card)
4. H6 (baseline red card)
5. H7 (baseline red card)
6. D13 (red card but lower utility)
7. S1 (black card)
8. S4 (black card)
9. S5 (black card)
10. S8 (black card)

Since D6 is the only card that stands out, I will include it multiple times to reflect my confidence.

Final Card List: [D6, D6, D6, D6, H2, H3, H6, H7, D13, S1]
Card List: [D5, D7, H4, H5, H8, H9, S2, S4, S5, S6]

Based on the provided card list and my knowledge, here is my assessment of the cards:

- D7 has a score of +3.5 (Tier B).
- D5 has a score of +0.4 (as a red card, but not in the priority tiers).
- H4, H5, H8, H9, S2, S4, S5, and S6 have lower scores as they are not in the priority tiers and are either red or black cards.

Given the above analysis, my final list will heavily favor D7 due to its high score, and I will include D5 as a secondary option.
